comments: Capela (ATL) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Collins (ATL) shuffles his feet before receiving the pass. However, when he lifts his right foot, he establishes his left as his pivot, which he lifts before releasing his dribble.
Joseph (DET) establishes a legal guarding position in Collins' (ATL) path during the drive, and Collins loses control of the ball prior to incidental contact occurring.
Collins (ATL) cleanly blocks Cunningham's (DET) shot attempt before it touches the backboard.
Bogdanovic (DET) brings his left arm toward Murray?s (ATL) path and marginal contact occurs as he loses his balance during the drive.
Stewart (DET) is absorbing the initial contact that occurs with Hunter (ATL), which causes him to naturally step backward during the screen.
Hunter (ATL) jumps from point A to point B into Bogdanovic (DET) and delivers contact after his release on his jump shot attempt.
Joseph (DET) extends his left arm forward and does not maintain a legal guarding position when contact occurs with Young (ATL) during the rip-through.
Stewart (DET) is in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Collins (ATL) does not maintain verticality when he makes contact with Bey's (DET) arm on the driving shot attempt.
Stewart (DET) makes marginal contact with Murray (ATL) as both players go toward the rebound.
Cunningham (DET) brings a slight hand toward Young?s (ATL) path, and Young moves through the marginal contact during the drive.
Young (ATL) gathers the ball on both feet and takes one step with his right foot before releasing the pass.
Capela (ATL) elevates for the shot attempt at the basket and marginal contact occurs with Livers' (DET) left arm.
Stewart (DET) and Collins (ATL) both make a play on the ball, and marginal arm contact occurs as Collins attempts the shot at the basket.
Capela (ATL) moves alongside Cunningham?s (DET) path with a legally bent forearm when incidental contact occurs on the driving shot attempt.
Bogdanovic (DET) commits a take foul on Murray (ATL). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Bogdanovic (DET) lifts and replants his left pivot foot before releasing the ball for the start of his dribble.
Livers (DET) commits a take foul on Young (ATL).
